BLKUSEQA.MX.long_name: BLK Acciones Estados Unidos SA de CV F.I.R.V. A
BLKUSEQA.MX.summary: BNMUSEQ is an investment company that invests predominately (minimum 80% of the total assets) in shares belonging to the US stock market, either directly, through ETFs (Exchange Traded Funds) or by means of the acquisition of shares of national and/or foreign equity investment companies. Stocks and ETFs must be listed in the international system of quotes ("SIC") or listed on the Bolsa Mexicana de Valores. BNMUSEQ will seek to offer a competitive performance with respect to the performance of the S & P500 index, less costs and taxes in the respective series.
BLKUSEQA.MX.family: Impulsora de Fondos Banamex SA de CV

FT-USA1A.MX.long_name: Franklin US Opportunities Fund SA de CV S.I.R.V. A
FT-USA1A.MX.summary: Invest the proceeds from the placement of the shares of Franopr in the acquisition of shares issued by other investment companies in debt or equity instruments.
FT-USA1A.MX.manager_bio: Grant Bowers, VP, is lead portfolio manager of Franklin Growth Opportunities Fund and member of Franklin Equity Group's U.S. Growth team. He joined the firm in 1993 as a fixed income analyst and in 1998 became an equity analyst covering the telecom, media, publishing, transportation and business services industries. He was lead portfolio manager of Franklin Global Communications Fund from 2002 to 2008. He studied economics at UC Davis. Before joining the firm, he served in the U.S. Army.
